attribute.name: fallback
attribute.description: Use a text area instead of the javascript HTML editor. Default is false. Use with caution.

attribute.name: type
attribute.description: The type of the value. It can be either fragment for an HTML fragment (default) or document for a full HTML document, with head, title, body, ... tags.

attribute.name: allowEditSource
attribute.description: Allows the user to edit the HTML source code. Default is true.

attribute.name: allowExternalLinks
attribute.description: Allows the user to insert external links. Default is true.

attribute.name: addKupuLogo
attribute.description: Show the Kupu Logo in the buttons bar. Default is true.

attribute.name: showAllToolBoxes
attribute.description: Shortcut to avoid setting all the showXXToolBox to true. Default is false.

attribute.name: showPropertiesToolBox
attribute.description: Show the Properties tool box next to the text. Default is false.

attribute.name: showLinksToolBox
attribute.description: Show the Links tool box next to the text. Default is false.

attribute.name: showImagesToolBox
attribute.description: Show the Images tool box next to the text. Default is false.

attribute.name: showTablesToolBox
attribute.description: Show the Tables tool box next to the text. Default is false.

attribute.name: showCleanupExpressionsToolBox
attribute.description: Show the Cleanup Expressions tool box next to the text. Default is false.

attribute.name: showDebugToolBox
attribute.description: Show the Debug tool box next to the text. Default is false.
